mapper.select: select g.id, g.subscribe_id, g.group_account, g.leader_user, g.is_active, g.group_name, g.billing_date, g.invitation_code from `group` g where g.id = #{id}

SELECT g.id, g.subscribe_id, g.group_account, g.leader_user, g.is_active, g.group_name, g.billing_date, g.invitation_code FROM ( select u.group_id FROM usergroup u where u.user_id = #{id} ) T1 inner join `group` g on T1.group_id = g.id
